overall_recommendations.staffing_strategy: Anticipate up to ~20% increase during holidays and major events; cross-train for drive-thru efficiency and implement flexible overtime or shift swaps for peaks

operational_risks: Potential SR-85 construction delays affecting access; weather shifts could alter demand mix between hot and cold items
Supply chain pressure for limited-time items and high-demand SKUs during peaks
overall_recommendations.competitive_considerations: Nearby QSR competitors (e.g., chicken or taco concepts) may emphasize chicken or value promotions; differentiate with any exclusive McDonald's LTOs, value platform, and family appeal.
